name: Simply Ludo．
description:
Best selling Simply Ludo game coming on iOS now!

Simply Ludo is a simple board game for two to four players. In the game, the players race their four tokens from start to finish according to dice rolls.

The game is originated from the traditional Indian game Pachisi. It has different variations all over the world with minor differences in rules. These includes Sorry!, Tock, Mensch ärgere dich niche. In this game we use the Chinese rule that introduced more randomness and fun. It also came with a plane theme and called Aeroplane Chess (or Flying Chess) in China.

Features
- Play against the computer AI
- Up to 4 players
- Intuitive touch control
- Nice sound effect
- Team supported, which can play 2 vs 2 mode
- Control dice number
